column5: Well got the Call from the MNR we are back in bussiness for Harvesting Bait  as of Tuesday the May 1st . Thanks for your Support ONF ....Fishmaster
Good to know    about time this Bull ends
Did they lift it completely or just so that bait can be harvested and sold locally, not shipped North.
I haven't seen it in the news yet. Good question, Taper.
From pos to pos is now allowed. Read your newest OOD mag for details. It's all in the hotwire section. Don't see that section? join the OFAH
I like OOD but I didn't think that they were the authority where Ontario MNR rulings were concerned. I didn't see anything on the MNR site.

Ditto to what Roy said and I shouldn't have to join a private organization to see what is happening in our public fishery.  Sounds like a case of the OMNR giving in.... to speed up the VHS spread process and to appease the "economy". They know it's in many lakes so why slow it's spread down at the expense of anyone's lively hood.
